description: A timeless classic. For three generations, athletes and outdoor enthusiasts have come to rely on the comfortable, multifunctional and durable Innominata. The classic fleece jacket always keeps you warm during the winter months or those in-between seasons when hiking, trekking or simply going about your daily business. The loose fit makes it extra comfortable. It can be worn on its own or as a thermal layer on really cold days. The high-quality Polartec® Thermal Pro fleece with recycled polyester is breathable, fast-drying and is easy to care for. No matter how often you wash it, the Innominata retains its shape and is both a useful and sustainable investment. The functional, durable fleece jacket with a classic outdoor look is versatile and never goes out of style.
name: Mammut Innominata ML Jacket - Mens
